item.title: Spark开发
item.description: 使用scala进行开发 Step1: 安装sbt $ curl https://bintray.com/sbt/rpm/rpm | sudo tee /etc/yum.repos.d/bintray-sbt-rpm.repo $ sudo yum install sbt 配置源： # cat ~/.sbt/repositories [repositories] # 本地源 local # 阿里源 aliyun: http://maven.aliyun.com/nexus/content/groups/public/ typesafe: http://repo.typesafe.com/typesafe/ivy-releases/, [organization]/[module]/(scala_[scalaVersion]/)(sbt_[sbtVersion]/)[revision]/[type]s/[artifact](-[classifier]).[ext], bootOnly sonatype-oss-releases maven-central sonatype-oss-snapshots Step2: 创建项目 可以使用Giter8模版创建项目。 $ sbt new imarios/frameless.g8 spark相关的几个模版： holdenk/sparkProjectTemplate.g8 (Template for Scala Apache Spark project). imarios/frameless.g8 (A simple frameless template to start with more expressive types for Spark) nttdata-oss/basic-spark-project.
